CustomField.description: [ZRM] Campo que se obtiene a partir de la nueva External request de Customer_KPI
CustomField.formula: Case( DescriptionScoreCLTV_NoLife__c, "N/A", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_NoLife__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "1 estrella roja", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_NoLife__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "2 estrellas amarillas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_NoLife__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "3 estrellas amarillas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_NoLife__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "4 estrellas amarillas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_NoLife__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "5 estrellas amarillas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.CLTV_NoLife__c, IMAGE($Setup.Account_Score_KPI__c.Info_Icon__c, "Info Icon", 16, 16) & " " & IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), $Label.ZRM_GlobalCustomerValue_NoValue )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Pulsa sobre la imagen para mostrar más información
CustomField.label: Global Customer Value (Non-Life)
